songs.title: Dance All Night*
songs.lyrics:
From snippets
...These problems always weigh me down
With the music slow, blow
In my mind I'm satisfied

[Chorus - Charli XCX & MØ]
I just wanna dance all night
I just wanna dance all night
I just wanna live my life
I just wanna dance all night
Nothing else on my mind, ya
Sippin' on cheap champagne

Fuck it yeah I'm only twenty five
